AAI Recruitment 2025 - Apply Online for 19 Apprentice Posts
Harshitha / All Government Jobs / Aug 13, 2025, 16:03 IST
 Airport Authority of India
 19 Jobs |  Posted On : 13-Aug-2025 |  Tamil Nadu |  Salary : 12,000 to 15,000




FOLLOW

The Airport Authority of India (AAI) has officially released the notification to fill the vacancies of 19 Graduate Apprentice, Diploma Apprentice Posts. Interested and eligible candidates can also use this opportunity to apply for these posts before the last date of application. Candidates who have completed their B.E./B. Tech, Diploma in Mechanical, Civil, and Electrical  Engineering, can apply for the AAI Recruitment 2025. The interested applicants can apply in online mode. Here we have mentioned the education details, age limit, selection process, application fee, salary, and how to apply for these posts before the deadline. The application dates have already begun.




If you are more interested in Government Jobs, candidates can also apply for jobs in Tamil Nadu.

AAI Recruitment 2025 Eligibility Criteria:
Name of the Posts	Vacancies	Education
Graduate Apprentice	15	B.E./B.Tech in Civil, Electrical, and Mechanical Engineering
Diploma Apprentice	04	Diploma in Electrical, Civil Engineering.

AAI Recruitment 2025 Age Limit:

The minimum age limit: 18 Years.
The maximum age limit: 45 Years.
Age relaxation is based on the Organisation's norms.

AAI Recruitment 2025 Selection Process:

The selection process involves

Assessmant
Document Verification.

AAI Recruitment 2025 Application Fee:

There is no application fee.

AAI Recruitment 2025 Pay Scale:

The minimum salary: Rs. 12,000/- per month.
The maximum salary: Rs. 15,000/- per month.
How to Apply for the AAI Recruitment 2025:
Go to the official website.
Visit the AAI Recruitment 2025 notification.
Read the instructions carefully and check the eligibility criteria.
Fill out the application form without any mistakes.
Pay the application fee (if needed).
Attach the required documents to the filled application form.
Submit the filled application form before the last date.
Download & take a printout of the filled application form for further use.

Important Dates:

Starting date	08-08-2025
Closing date	24-08-2025

 

Official Notification	Click Here
Apply Online	Click Here

Join on Telegram	Join Now
